df-cms
blocks.content: Define the class of complete metric spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-bn
blocks.content: Define the class of all Banach spaces. A Banach space is a normed vector space such that both the vector space and the scalar field are complete under their respective norm-induced metrics. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-hl
blocks.content: Define the class of all subcomplex Hilbert spaces. A subcomplex Hilbert space is a Banach space which is also an inner product space over a subfield of the field of complex numbers closed under square roots of nonnegative reals. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.)

blocks.name: isbn
blocks.content: A Banach space is a normed vector space with a complete induced metric. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isbn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cbn), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cnvc, ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms)))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(cnvc, ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms)))
  elin(c0, cnvc, ccms)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cbn, cin(cnvc, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), ccms))
  eleq1d(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), ccms, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(csca, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, csca)
  df-bn(hs0)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cnvc, ccms))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, ccms))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isbn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp))
  ⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ∈ Ban, (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp), (c0 ∈(NrmVec ⋂ CMetSp)∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp), ((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp)∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp))
  anbi1i(c0 ∈(NrmVec ⋂ CMetSp), c1 ∈ CMetSp, (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp))
  elin(c0, cnvc, ccms)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cbn, (NrmVec ⋂ CMetSp), c1 ∈ CMetSp, (Scalar ` hs0)∈ CMetSp)
  eleq1d((Scalar ` hs0), ccms, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Scalar ` hs0), c1, (Scalar ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, csca)
  df-bn(hs0)
  df-3an(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ CMetSp)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((NrmVec ⋂ CMetSp))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ CMetSp)
}

blocks.name: iscms
blocks.content: A complete metric space is a metric space with a complete metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscms(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccms), wa(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccms, cms, wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)), wsbc(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccmet, cv(hs1)))))
  sbcied(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), universe, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccmet, cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  fvexd(cbs, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq12d(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccmet, cv(hs1)), c1, cfv(ccmet, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eqr(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  reseq12d(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cfv(cds, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cds)
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(ccmet, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan9eqr(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-cms(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cms)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscms(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CMetSp ↔(c0 ∈ MetSp ∧ c1 ∈(CMet ` c2)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccms, cms, c1 ∈(CMet ` c2), [(Base ` hs0)/ hs1]((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 × hs1))∈(CMet ` hs1))
  sbcied(hs1, (Base ` hs0), universe, hs0 = c0, ((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 × hs1))∈(CMet ` hs1), c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
  fvexd(cbs, hs0, hs0 = c0)
  eleq12d(((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 × hs1)), (CMet ` hs1), c1, (CMet ` c2), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  syl6eqr(((dist ` hs0)|`(hs1 × hs1)), c1, ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  reseq12d((dist ` hs0), (hs1 × hs1), (dist ` c0), (c2 × c2), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 =(Base ` hs0), (dist ` hs0)=(dist ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cds)
  sqxpeqd(hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  fveq2d(ccmet, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  sylan9eqr(hs1, c2, (Base ` hs0), hs0 = c0, hs1 =(Base ` hs0))
  id(hs1 =(Base ` hs0))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-cms(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cms)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: cmspropd
blocks.content: Property deduction for a complete metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, ccms), wa(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wcel(c1, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c1)))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c1, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c1))))
  mspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eleq12d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  fveq2d(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), c2, w0)
  iscms(c0, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  iscms(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ CMetSp ↔ c1 ∈ CMetSp))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2))=((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ CMetSp, (c0 ∈ MetSp ∧((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))∈(CMet `(Base ` c0))), (c1 ∈ MetSp ∧((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1)))∈(CMet `(Base ` c1))))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ MetSp, ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))∈(CMet `(Base ` c0)), c1 ∈ MetSp, ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1)))∈(CMet `(Base ` c1)))
  mspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eleq12d(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), (CMet `(Base ` c0)), ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1))), (CMet `(Base ` c1)), w0)
  eqtr3d(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1))), ((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)), ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2)), w0)
  reseq2d((dist ` c0), (c2 × c2), ((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, (Base ` c0), w0)
  reseq2d((dist ` c1), (c2 × c2), ((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, (Base ` c1), w0)
  fveq2d(ccmet, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), w0)
  eqtr3d((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  iscms(c0, ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))))
  iscms(c1, ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1))), (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid(((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1))))
}

  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms)), wceq(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cds, c3)), wcel(c1, universe))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cms), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylbi(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, universe), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))

  imp(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(ccmet, c1)))

blocks.name: lssbn
blocks.content: A subspace of a Banach space is a Banach space iff it is closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssbn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)), wcel(c3, ccms))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccms)), wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(c0, cnvc))
  bnnvc(c0)
  lssnvc(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqeltrrd(cfv(csca, c3), ccms, cfv(csca, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c3)))
  resssca(c1, c2, cfv(csca, c0), c3, c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms))
  bnsca(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  baib(wa(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms)), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccms))
  bitri(wcel(c3, cbn), wa(wa(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms)), wcel(c3, ccms)), w3a(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms)))
  isbn(c3, cfv(csca, c3))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c3))
  3anan32(wcel(c3, cnvc), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c3), ccms))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4))), wcel(c0, ccms), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  bncms(c0)

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
}

blocks.name: cmetcusp1
blocks.content: If the uniform set of a complete metric space is the uniform structure generated by its metric, then it is a complete uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmetcusp1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: ishl
blocks.content: The predicate "is a subcomplex Hilbert space." A Hilbert space is a Banach space which is also an inner product space, i.e. whose norm satisfies the parallelogram law. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlbn
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a Banach space. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.)

blocks.name: hlcph
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlphl
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is an inner product space (also called a pre-Hilbert space). (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlcms
blocks.content: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a complete metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlprlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ hlpr . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hlprlem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chl), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  3jca(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms))
  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c0, ccph))
  cphsubrg(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrrd(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr, c2, wcel(c0, chl))
  3syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c2, cdr), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, clvec))
  cphlvec(c0)
  lvecdrng(c0, c2)
  eqeltrrd(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms, c2, wcel(c0, chl))
  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wceq(c2, co(ccnfld, cress, c1)), wcel(c0, ccph))
  hlcph(c0)
  cphsca(c0, c2, c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c2, ccms), wcel(c0, cbn))
  hlbn(c0)
  bnsca(c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hlprlem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil →(c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld)∧(CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ DivRing ∧(CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp))
  ⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  3jca(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld), (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ DivRing, (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp)
  syl(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld), c0 ∈ CPreHil)
  cphsubrg(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrrd((CCfld[|`s]c1), cdr, c2, c0 ∈ CHil)
  3syl(c0 ∈ CHil, c2 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ LVec)
  cphlvec(c0)
  lvecdrng(c0, c2)
  eqeltrrd((CCfld[|`s]c1), ccms, c2, c0 ∈ CHil)
  syl(c0 ∈ CHil, c2 =(CCfld[|`s]c1), c0 ∈ CPreHil)
  hlcph(c0)
  cphsca(c0, c2, c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ CHil, c2 ∈ CMetSp, c0 ∈ Ban)
  hlbn(c0)
  bnsca(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: hlress
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex Hilbert space contains ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: hlpr
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex Hilbert space is either ` RR ` or ` CC ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: ishl2
blocks.content: A Hilbert space is a complete subcomplex pre-Hilbert space over ` RR ` or ` CC ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ishl2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, chl), w3a(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, chl), w3a(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc))), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))
  ishl(c0)
  3bitr4ri(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc))), w3a(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c0, ccph)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc))), wcel(c0, ccph)))
  df-3an(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c0, ccph))
  3ancomb(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
  pm5.32ri(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph), wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc))))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cbn), wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc))), wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c2, ccms)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccph), wb(wcel(c0, cbn), wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c2, ccms))), wcel(c0, cnvc))
  cphnvc(c0)
  baib(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cbn), wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c2, ccms)))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cbn), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c2, ccms))), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c2, ccms)))
  isbn(c0, c2)
  3anass(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c2, ccms))
  anbi2d(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c2, ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c2, ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms))
  eleq1d(c2, ccms, co(ccnfld, cress, c1), wcel(c0, ccph))
  impbid1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, ccph), wi(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr))
  cphsubrg(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrrd(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr, c2, wcel(c0, ccph))
  cphsca(c0, c2, c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c2, cdr), wcel(c0, clvec))
  cphlvec(c0)
  lvecdrng(c0, c2)
  3expia(wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
  cncdrg(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c1))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, c1))
  syl(wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms), wo(wceq(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cc)))
  elpri(c1, cr, cc)
  jaoi(wceq(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cc), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms))
  syl6eqel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms, co(ccnfld, cress, cr), wceq(c1, cr))
  oveq2(c1, cr, ccnfld, cress)
  mpbir(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), ccms), wcel(cr, cfv(ccld, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))))
  recld2(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  mp2an(wb(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), ccms), wcel(cr, cfv(ccld, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)))), wcel(ccnfld, ccms), wss(cr, cc))
  ax-resscn()
  cmsss(ccnfld, cr, cc, co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  syl6eqel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms, co(ccnfld, cress, cc), wceq(c1, cc))
  oveq2(c1, cc, ccnfld, cress)
  eqeltri(co(ccnfld, cress, cc), ccms, ccnfld)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(ccnfld, cress, cc), ccnfld), wcel(ccnfld, ccms))
  ressid(ccnfld, ccms, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  cncms()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ishl2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil ↔(c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }))
  ⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ CHil, (c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }), (c0 ∈ Ban ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil))
  ishl(c0)
  3bitr4ri((c0 ∈ Ban ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil), (c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }), (c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ } ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil), ((c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil))
  df-3an(c0 ∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }, c0 ∈ CPreHil)
  3ancomb(c0 ∈ CMetSp, c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })
  pm5.32ri(c0 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ CPreHil, (c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }))
  bitrd(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ Ban, (c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }), (c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ CMetSp))
  syl(c0 ∈ CPreHil, (c0 ∈ Ban ↔(c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ CMetSp)), c0 ∈ NrmVec)
  cphnvc(c0)
  baib(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ Ban, (c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ CMetSp))
  bitri(c0 ∈ Ban, (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ CMetSp)), (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c0 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ CMetSp))
  isbn(c0, c2)
  3anass(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ CMetSp)
  anbi2d(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })
  bitrd(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c2 ∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }, (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp)
  eleq1d(c2, ccms, (CCfld[|`s]c1), c0 ∈ CPreHil)
  impbid1(c0 ∈ CPreHil, (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ CPreHil, ((CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp → c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }), c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld), (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ DivRing)
  cphsubrg(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrrd((CCfld[|`s]c1), cdr, c2, c0 ∈ CPreHil)
  cphsca(c0, c2, c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c2 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈ LVec)
  cphlvec(c0)
  lvecdrng(c0, c2)
  3expia(c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld), (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ DivRing, (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })
  cncdrg(c1, (CCfld[|`s]c1))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]c1))
  syl(c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }, (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp, (c1 = ℝ ∨ c1 = ℂ))
  elpri(c1, cr, cc)
  jaoi(c1 = ℝ, c1 = ℂ, (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ CMetSp)
  syl6eqel((CCfld[|`s]c1), ccms, (CCfld[|`s]ℝ), c1 = ℝ)
  oveq2(c1, cr, ccnfld, cress)
  mpbir((CCfld[|`s]ℝ)∈ CMetSp, ℝ ∈(Clsd `(TopOpen ` CCfld)))
  recld2((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  mp2an(((CCfld[|`s]ℝ)∈ CMetSp ↔ ℝ ∈(Clsd `(TopOpen ` CCfld))), CCfld ∈ CMetSp, ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  ax-resscn()
  cmsss(ccnfld, cr, cc, (CCfld[|`s]ℝ), (TopOpen ` CCfld))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]ℝ))
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  syl6eqel((CCfld[|`s]c1), ccms, (CCfld[|`s]ℂ), c1 = ℂ)
  oveq2(c1, cc, ccnfld, cress)
  eqeltri((CCfld[|`s]ℂ), ccms, ccnfld)
  ax-mp((CCfld[|`s]ℂ)= CCfld, CCfld ∈ CMetSp)
  ressid(ccnfld, ccms, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  cncms()
}

blocks.name: cphssphl
blocks.content: A Banach subspace of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a subcomplex Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 25-Sep-2022.)

blocks.name: cmslssbn
blocks.content: A complete linear subspace of a normed vector space is a Banach space. We furthermore have to assume that the field of scalars is complete since this is a requirement in the current definition of Banach spaces ~ df-bn . (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmslssbn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cbn))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cbn), wcel(c1, cnvc), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  ad2ant2rl(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, cnvc))
  lssnvc(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  impancom(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms))
  eleq1d(cfv(csca, c0), ccms, cfv(csca, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))))
  ad2antll(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c1)))
  resssca(c2, c3, cfv(csca, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  isbn(c1, cfv(csca, c1))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmslssbn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp)∧(c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3))→ c1 ∈ Ban)
  ⊣ c1 =(c0[|`s]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  syl3anbrc(((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp)∧(c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), c1 ∈ Ban, c1 ∈ NrmVec, c1 ∈ CMetSp, (Scalar ` c1)∈ CMetSp)
  ad2ant2rl(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ NrmVec)
  lssnvc(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  simprl((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp), c1 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ c3)
  imp((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp), (c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (Scalar ` c1)∈ CMetSp)
  impancom(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, (c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (Scalar ` c1)∈ CMetSp)
  biimpd((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, (Scalar ` c1)∈ CMetSp)
  eleq1d((Scalar ` c0), ccms, (Scalar ` c1), (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3)))
  ad2antll(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c1 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ c3, (Scalar ` c0)=(Scalar ` c1))
  resssca(c2, c3, (Scalar ` c0), c1, c0)
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  isbn(c1, (Scalar ` c1))
  eqid((Scalar ` c1))
}

blocks.name: cmscsscms
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a complete metric space which is also a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a complete metric space. Remark: the assumption that the Banach space must be a (subcomplex) pre-Hilbert space is required because the definition of ` ClSubSp ` is based on an inner product. If ` ClSubSp ` was generalized to arbitrary topological spaces (or at least topological modules), this assumption could be omitted. (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmscsscms(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccms))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccss, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(c3, cms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3))))
  syl5eqel(c3, cms, co(c0, cress, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cms), wcel(c0, cms))
  ressms(c0, c1, c2)
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctopn, c0))))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctopn, c0)), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, cfv(ctopn, c0))))
  csscld(c0, c1, c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  3bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctopn, c0))), wcel(cres(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(ccld, cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))))
  eleq1d(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cfv(ccmet, cfv(cbs, c3)), cres(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqtr4d(cres(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cres(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  reseq1d(cfv(cds, c3), cxp(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c3)), cfv(cds, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqcomd(cfv(cds, c3), cfv(cds, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cds, c3)))
  ressds(c1, c2, cfv(cds, c0), c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))

blocks.name: bncssbn
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a Banach space which is also a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a Banach space. Remark: the assumption that the Banach space must be a (subcomplex) pre-Hilbert space is required because the definition of ` ClSubSp ` is based on an inner product. If ` ClSubSp ` was generalized for arbitrary topological spaces, this assuption could be omitted. (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm bncssbn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cbn))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccss, c0))
} = {
  syl12anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cbn), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wcel(c3, ccms), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c0)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms))
  bnnvc(c0)
  bnsca(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))

  bncms(c0)
  cmscsscms(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c0)), wcel(c0, cphl))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cphl))
  cphphl(c0)
  csslss(c0, c1, c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  cmslssbn(c0, c3, c1, cfv(clss, c0))

blocks.name: cssbn
blocks.content: A complete subspace of a normed vector space with a complete scalar field is a Banach space. Remark: In contrast to ` ClSubSp ` , a complete subspace is defined by "a linear subspace in which all Cauchy sequences converge to a point in the subspace". This is closer to the original, but deprecated definition ` CH ` ( ~ df-ch ) of closed subspaces of a Hilbert space. It may be superseded by ~ cmslssbn . (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 6-Oct-2022.)

  sqxpeqd(c1, cfv(cbs, c4), w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  subgbas(c1, c0, c4)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c4))), wcel(c4, cngp))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, cngp))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, cngp), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cnlm))
  nvcnlm(c0)
  nlmngp(c0)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(c0, clmod))
  nvclmod(c0)
  lsssubg(c0, c1, c2)
  subgngp(c0, c1, c4)
  ngpmet(c4, cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cbs, c4))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  iscmet2(c3, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cmopn, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmopn, c3))
  iscms(c4, cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  cmslssbn(c0, c4, c1, c2)
}

thm cssbn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))→ c4 ∈ Ban)
  ⊣ c4 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =((dist ` c0)|`(c1 × c1))
} = {
  syl22anc(((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c4 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c4 ∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  simpl2(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  sylanbrc(((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c4 ∈ CMetSp, c4 ∈ MetSp, ((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4)))∈(CMet `(Base ` c4)))
  syl(((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c4 ∈ MetSp, c4 ∈ NrmGrp)
  adantr((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), c4 ∈ NrmGrp)
  ngpms(c4)
  eqeltrd(((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4))), (CMet `(Base ` c4)), c3, ((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))))
  adantr((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), ((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4)))= c3)
  eqcomd(((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4))), c3, (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  sylanbrc(((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c3 ∈(CMet `(Base ` c4)), c3 ∈(Met `(Base ` c4)), (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  adantr((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), c3 ∈(Met `(Base ` c4)))
  eqeltrd(c3, (Met `(Base ` c4)), ((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4))), (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl5eq(c3, ((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4))), ((dist ` c0)|`(c1 × c1)), (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  reseq12d((dist ` c0), (c1 × c1), (dist ` c4), ((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4)), (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2, (dist ` c0)=(dist ` c4))
  ressds(c1, c2, (dist ` c0), c4, c0)
  eqid((dist ` c0))
  sqxpeqd(c1, (Base ` c4), (c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1 =(Base ` c4), c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  3adant2(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  subgbas(c1, c0, c4)
  syl((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4)))∈(Met `(Base ` c4)), c4 ∈ NrmGrp)
  3adant2(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ NrmGrp)
  syl2an2r(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ NrmGrp, c0 ∈ NrmGrp, c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ NrmGrp, c0 ∈ NrmMod)
  nvcnlm(c0)
  nlmngp(c0)
  sylan(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0), c0 ∈ LMod)
  nvclmod(c0)
  lsssubg(c0, c1, c2)
  subgngp(c0, c1, c4)
  ngpmet(c4, ((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4))), (Base ` c4))
  simpr((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  iscmet2(c3, (Base ` c4), (MetOpen ` c3))
  eqid((MetOpen ` c3))
  iscms(c4, ((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4))), (Base ` c4))
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  eqid(((dist ` c4)|`((Base ` c4)×(Base ` c4))))
  simpl3(c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  cmslssbn(c0, c4, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: csschl
blocks.content: A complete subspace of a complex pre-Hilbert space is a complex Hilbert space. Remarks: (a) In contrast to ` ClSubSp ` , a complete subspace is defined by "a linear subspace in which all Cauchy sequences converge to a point in the subspace". This is closer to the original, but deprecated definition ` CH ` ( ~ df-ch ) of closed subspaces of a Hilbert space. (b) This theorem does not hold for arbitrary subcomplex (pre-)Hilbert spaces, because the scalar field as restriction of the field of the complex numbers need not be closed. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 6-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm csschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wa(wcel(c4, chl), wceq(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld)
} = {
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wcel(c4, chl), wceq(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))), wcel(c4, chl), wcel(c4, cbn))
  syl31anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wcel(c4, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))), wcel(c0, cnvc))
  cphnvc(c0)
  mp1i(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3))))), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld))
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(ccnfld, ccms))
  cncms()
  eleq1(cfv(csca, c0), ccnfld, ccms)
  simp2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))))
  cssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  cphssphl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(ccau, c3), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c3)))), wceq(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld))
  syl5reqr(cfv(csca, c4), ccnfld, cfv(csca, c0), wcel(c1, c2))
  resssca(c1, c2, cfv(csca, c0), c4, c0)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))→(c4 ∈ CHil ∧(Scalar ` c4)= CCfld))
  ⊣ c4 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =((dist ` c0)|`(c1 × c1))
  ⊣ (Scalar ` c0)= CCfld
} = {
  jca((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c4 ∈ CHil, (Scalar ` c4)= CCfld)
  syld3an3(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), c4 ∈ CHil, c4 ∈ Ban)
  syl31anc((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), c4 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), c0 ∈ NrmVec)
  cphnvc(c0)
  mp1i((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧(Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3)))), (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, (Scalar ` c0)= CCfld)
  mpbiri((Scalar ` c0)= CCfld, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, CCfld ∈ CMetSp)
  cncms()
  eleq1((Scalar ` c0), ccnfld, ccms)
  simp2(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  simp3(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))))
  cssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  cphssphl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ c2, (Cau ` c3)⊆ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c3))), (Scalar ` c4)= CCfld)
  syl5reqr((Scalar ` c4), ccnfld, (Scalar ` c0), c1 ∈ c2)
  resssca(c1, c2, (Scalar ` c0), c4, c0)
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
}

blocks.name: cmslsschl
blocks.content: A complete linear subspace of a subcomplex Hilbert space is a subcomplex Hilbert space. (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmslsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, chl))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, chl), wcel(c1, cbn), wcel(c1, ccph))
  syl21anc(w3a(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, cnvc))
  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cbn))
  bnnvc(c0)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms))
  syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms), wcel(c0, cbn))
  hlbn(c0)
  bnsca(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  3simpc(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))
  cmslssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, ccph))
  sylan(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, ccph), wcel(c0, ccph))
  hlcph(c0)
  cphsscph(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  ishl(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmslsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHil ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ c1 ∈ CHil)
  ⊣ c1 =(c0[|`s]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ CHil ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c1 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ Ban, c1 ∈ CPreHil)
  syl21anc((c0 ∈ CHil ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c1 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ NrmVec, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, (c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ NrmVec)
  syl(c0 ∈ CHil, c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ Ban)
  bnnvc(c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ c3, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp)
  syl(c0 ∈ CHil, (Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp, c0 ∈ Ban)
  hlbn(c0)
  bnsca(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  3simpc(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ c3)
  cmslssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3adant2(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ CMetSp, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ CPreHil)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CHil, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ CPreHil)
  hlcph(c0)
  cphsscph(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  ishl(c1)
}

blocks.name: chlcsschl
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a subcomplex Hilbert space is a subcomplex Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm chlcsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, chl))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccss, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, chl), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph))
  sylan(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))
  jca(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph))
  hlbn(c0)
  bncssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, ccph), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c0)))
  hlcph(c0)
  sylan(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c0)), wcel(c0, cphl))
  hlphl(c0)
  csslss(c0, c1, c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  cphsscph(c0, c1, cfv(clss, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c0))
  ishl(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm chlcsschl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ CHil)
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ClSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ CHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ CHil, c3 ∈ Ban, c3 ∈ CPreHil)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ Ban, (c0 ∈ Ban ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil))
  jca(c0 ∈ CHil, c0 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ CPreHil)
  hlbn(c0)
  bncssbn(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl2an2r(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈(LSubSp ` c0))
  hlcph(c0)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CHil, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈(LSubSp ` c0), c0 ∈ PreHil)
  hlphl(c0)
  csslss(c0, c1, c2, (LSubSp ` c0))
  cphsscph(c0, c1, (LSubSp ` c0), c3)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c0))
  ishl(c3)
}
